post.author: 고상호
post.content:
My former colleague, Austin Tam, leads a team in Rypple and he is looking for a developer. Here's the posting..
http://rypple.com/careers/senior-java-web-developer/claCLCvi8r4lnBeJe4bk1X
Easiest way to explain it is that it's like Facebook for business to help employees get more connected at work via sharing updates, goals, etc.
If you are interested, please let me know.
post.title: looking for a JAVA developer
